ApprovalsExceedQuorum.description: The number of approvals can't exceed the number of members.
ApprovalsExceedQuorum.title: Invalid number of approvals

InvalidDataDevice.description: Invalid data sent to the device.
InvalidDataDevice.title: Invalid data

NoChannelForDevice.description: Make sure you're using the right device.
NoChannelForDevice.title: Invalid device

RequestFinished.description: This request has already been approved or rejected.
RequestFinished.title: Request already approved or rejected

AmountTooHigh.title: Not enough funds
AmountTooHigh.description: You don't have enough funds to create this transaction.

ERC20FeesExceedParentAccountBalance.title: Not enough funds
ERC20FeesExceedParentAccountBalance.description: The parent Ethereum account must be credited to pay the confirmation fees of this transaction.

tecNO_DST_INSUF_XRP.title: Recipient not active
tecNO_DST_INSUF_XRP.description: The account on the receiving end of the transaction does not exist, and the transaction is not sending enough XRP to create it.

AmountExceedMax.title: Max amount exceeded
AmountExceedMax.description: The amount entered exceeds the limit of 100 UTXOs. Decrease the amount to a maximum of: {{max}}

RippleAmountExceedMinBalance.title: Not enough balance
RippleAmountExceedMinBalance.description: Please enter a lower amount. Your remaining balance can’t be below XRP 20.

InvalidAddressBecauseDestinationIsAlsoSo.title: Invalid address
InvalidAddressBecauseDestinationIsAlsoSo.description: It's not possible to send funds to yourself.

UserInvitationAlreadyUsed.title: Invitation link not available
UserInvitationAlreadyUsed.description: The invitation link has already been used.

UserIdAlreadyUsed.title: User ID already used
UserIdAlreadyUsed.description: This user ID has already been registered and can't be used again. Please contact your Administrator

GenericError.description: An error occurred. Please try again or contact Support.
GenericError.title: Error

NetworkTimeoutError.description: The request timed out. Please try again.
NetworkTimeoutError.title: Timeout error

DeviceNotOnDashboard.title: Device not on dashboard
DeviceNotOnDashboard.description: You must be on the Dashboard. Please close the Vault app on your device.

DeviceOnDashboardExpected.title: User denied manager
DeviceOnDashboardExpected.description: Please allow Ledger manager on your device.

AddressDuplicateNameCurrency.title: AddressDuplicateNameCurrency
AddressDuplicateNameCurrency.description: Name already exists. Address names must be unique per currency.

AddressDuplicateCurrencyAddress.title: AddressDuplicateCurrencyAddress
AddressDuplicateCurrencyAddress.description: Address already exists. A single occurrence of an address can be created per currency.

InvalidOrMissingAttestation.title: InvalidOrMissingAttestation
InvalidOrMissingAttestation.description: It seems the device does not contain a proper attestation.

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: You must authorize the update. Try again.

UserRefusedAllowManager.title: UserRefusedAllowManager
UserRefusedAllowManager.description: You must authorize the update. Try again.

NoWorkspaceForDevice.title: No workspace for this device
NoWorkspaceForDevice.description: This device has not been registered in any workspace

AccountNameAlreadyExists.title: Name already used
AccountNameAlreadyExists.description: An account already uses this name. Please enter a different one

generic.description: An error occurred. Please try again or contact Support.
generic.title: Error
